lead_paragraph: Tamika Whitmore scored 14 points — all in the first half — and Anna DeForge had 13 to lead Indiana to a 77-44 victory over the Liberty last night at the Garden. Tamika Catchings added 12 points for Indiana (20-11), which won its third straight and fourth in five games. The Fever beat the Liberty for the sixth straight time, including a sweep in the playoffs last year. Cathrine Kraayeveld scored 13 points and Ashley Battle had 10 for the Liberty (9-23). The Liberty scored a franchise-low 5 points in the third quarter.
